feed.title: VictoriaMetrics Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for VictoriaMetrics: v1.97.11
entry.content:
v1.97.11

Released at 2024-11-04

  • BUGFIX: vmalert: properly set group_name and file fields for recording rules in /api/v1/rules.
  • BUGFIX: Single-node VictoriaMetrics and vmstorage in VictoriaMetrics cluster: prevent panic when ingesting samples which are outisde of configured retention filters. This could happen when backfilling data with retention filters which exclude samples from the backfill range.

entry.title: New release for VictoriaMetrics: v1.102.6
entry.content:
v1.102.6

Released at 2024-11-04

  • BUGFIX: vmalert: properly set group_name and file fields for recording rules in /api/v1/rules.
  • BUGFIX: Single-node VictoriaMetrics and vmstorage in VictoriaMetrics cluster: prevent panic when ingesting samples which are outisde of configured retention filters. This could happen when backfilling data with retention filters which exclude samples from the backfill range.
  • BUGFIX: vmctl: fix issue with series matching for vmctl vm-native with --vm-native-disable-per-metric-migration flag enabled. See this issue.

entry.title: New release for VictoriaMetrics: v1.106.1
entry.content:
v1.106.1

Released at 2024-11-15

  • SECURITY: upgrade Go builder from Go1.23.1 to Go1.23.3. See the list of issues addressed in Go1.23.2 and Go1.23.3.

  • FEATURE: vmalert: reduces memory and CPU usage for high volume of triggered alerting rules. See this issue for details.

  • BUGFIX: vmauth: fixed unauthorized routing behavior inconsistency. See this issue for details.

  • BUGFIX: vmctl: drop rows that do not belong to the current series during import. The dropped rows should belong to another series whose tags are a superset of the current series. See this issue and this pull request. Thanks to @dpedu for reporting and cooperating with the test.
  • BUGFIX: vmsingle, vmselect in VictoriaMetrics cluster: keep the order of resulting time series when limit_offset is applied. See this issue.
  • BUGFIX: graphite: properly handle xFilesFactor=0 for transformRemoveEmptySeries function. See this PR for details.
  • BUGFIX: vmauth: fixed unauthorized routing behavior inconsistency. See this issue for details.
  • BUGFIX: vmauth: properly inherit drop_src_path_prefix_parts, load_balancing_policy, retry_status_codes and discover_backend_ips options by url_map entries if url_prefix option isn't set at the user config level. These options were inherited only when the url_prefix option was set. See this issue.
  • BUGFIX: vmauth: properly check availability of all the backends before giving up when proxying requests. Previously, vmauth could return an error even if there were healthy backends available. See this issue for details.
  • BUGFIX: dashboards: add file label filter to vmalert dashboard panels. Previously, metrics from groups with the same name but different rule files could be mixed in the results.
  • BUGFIX: Single-node VictoriaMetrics and vmstorage in VictoriaMetrics cluster: Optimize resources usage for configured downsampling with time-series filter. See this issue for details.
  • BUGFIX: vmstorage in VictoriaMetrics cluster: Properly return query results for search requests after index rotation. See this issue for details.
  • BUGFIX: vmselect in VictoriaMetrics cluster: Properly handle multitenant query request errors and correctly perform search for available tenants. See this issue for details.

entry.title: New release for VictoriaMetrics: v1.97.12
entry.content:
v1.97.12

Released at 2024-11-15

v1.97.x is a line of LTS releases. It contains important up-to-date bugfixes for VictoriaMetrics enterprise. All these fixes are also included in the latest community release. The v1.97.x line will be supported for at least 12 months since v1.97.0 release

  • BUGFIX: vmctl: drop rows that do not belong to the current series during import. The dropped rows should belong to another series whose tags are a superset of the current series. See this issue and this pull request. Thanks to @dpedu for reporting and cooperating with the test.
  • BUGFIX: vmsingle, vmselect in VictoriaMetrics cluster: keep the order of resulting time series when limit_offset is applied. See this issue.
  • BUGFIX: graphite: properly handle xFilesFactor=0 for transformRemoveEmptySeries function. See this PR for details.
  • BUGFIX: vmauth: properly check availability of all the backends before giving up when proxying requests. Previously, vmauth could return an error even if there were healthy backends available. See this issue for details.
  • BUGFIX: vmauth: fixed unauthorized routing behavior inconsistency. See this issue for details.

entry.title: New release for VictoriaMetrics: v1.102.7
entry.content:
v1.102.7

Released at 2024-11-15

v1.102.x is a line of LTS releases. It contains important up-to-date bugfixes for VictoriaMetrics enterprise. All these fixes are also included in the latest community release. The v1.102.x line will be supported for at least 12 months since v1.102.0 release

  • SECURITY: upgrade Go builder from Go1.23.1 to Go1.23.3. See the list of issues addressed in Go1.23.2 and Go1.23.3.

  • BUGFIX: vmctl: drop rows that do not belong to the current series during import. The dropped rows should belong to another series whose tags are a superset of the current series. See this issue and this pull request. Thanks to @dpedu for reporting and cooperating with the test.

  • BUGFIX: vmsingle, vmselect in VictoriaMetrics cluster: keep the order of resulting time series when limit_offset is applied. See this issue.
  • BUGFIX: graphite: properly handle xFilesFactor=0 for transformRemoveEmptySeries function. See this PR for details.
  • BUGFIX: vmauth: properly check availability of all the backends before giving up when proxying requests. Previously, vmauth could return an error even if there were healthy backends available. See this issue for details.
  • BUGFIX: vmauth: fixed unauthorized routing behavior inconsistency. See this issue for details.
  • BUGFIX: vmauth: properly inherit drop_src_path_prefix_parts, load_balancing_policy, retry_status_codes and discover_backend_ips options by url_map entries if url_prefix option isn't set at the user config level. These options were inherited only when the url_prefix option was set. See this issue.
  • BUGFIX: dashboards: add file label filter to vmalert dashboard panels. Previously, metrics from groups with the same name but different rule files could be mixed in the results.
